base.name: pine trees
base.description: High slim pine trees. Green leaves flickers gently in the breeze.

responseAction.textresponse: Really all of them? Even for with you would need to cut it down... and cut it out ..

equipped.failtext: You cannot with your bare hands

responseAction.textresponse: Still, you don't feel up to the task. These trees are old and beautiful. Whats the point cutting down these.
